title: Kilimanjaro
subtitle: Trek the Machame Route to the Summit the highest point in Africa
short_description: Climb one the worldâ€™s seven summits! The scenic Machame Route offers one of the highest success rates on the mountain. Trek across a beautiful landscape as you ascend through a variety of eco-climatic zones until you finally reach the ice fields at the summit.  The package includes accommodation, transfers, expert guides and most meals.
accommodations: Shared hotel room and tent camping
